channel.title: Help with xp modes
channel.description: ok Xp modes are added in my server and everything works fine except the exp modes are all the same xp.. so extreme mode is same xp mode as easy mode ive changed the xp rate in config.java and complied and so on and it still is the same xp rate. any suggestions?

item.title: Help with xp modes
item.dc:creator: @segaxvi segaxvi
item.description:
@segaxvi wrote:

Make sure the compiler is actually compiling the files, I’ve had that problem before! :rolleyes:

Read full topic
